description: To provide notification for the event when CA or local certificate
is about to expire. By default the notification will be sent 60
days before the certificate expiration time. If the trap number of
days before expiration is set then notification will be sent as per
configured value. The notification will be sent every day from the
60 days or the configured value for certificate expiration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JS-CERT-MIB::jnxJsCertExpiring JUNIPER-JS-CERT-MIB::jnxJsCertName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-CERT-MIB::jnxJsCertExpireTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Cert-id of the local or CA certificate.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-CERT-MIB::jnxJsCertName

description: The expiration time and date of the local certificate or CA.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-CERT-MIB::jnxJsCertExpireTime
